subject: Negotiation
title: Strategic Concessions
description: A quick win: understand Strategic Concessions.

hook.text: Every concession should feel hard-won. Giving things away easily signals you have much more to give.

buildup.text: Strategic concessions are planned in advance â€” you know what you'll give, when, and what you'll get in return.

discovery.text: Each concession should be smaller than the last, signaling you're approaching your limit.

twist.text: Never concede without getting something back. Unreciprocated concessions train the other side to take more.

climax.text: Plan your concession strategy: what to give, in what order, and always in exchange for something.

punchline.text: Every concession is a trade. Never give without getting.

quiz.question: Why should concessions get progressively smaller?
options: It signals you're approaching your limit and can't give much more
Smaller concessions are easier to calculate
